mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, b.* from (select rownum ltqnaNo, a.* from (select r.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS COUNT from lt_qna r where lt_no = #{ltNo} AND (q_content LIKE '%'||#{contentSearchKey}||'%' AND writer LIKE '%'||#{writerSearchKey}||'%' AND qna_st_code LIKE '%'||#{qnaStCodeSearchKey}||'%') order by qna_no) a order by ltqnaNo desc) b WHERE ROWNUM <= 10*(#{page})) WHERE RN > (#{page}-1)*10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LT_QNA WHERE LT_NO = #{ltNo}
